servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0961: Pressure Control Solenoid “A” Control Circuit Range / Performance
P0965: Pressure Control Solenoid “B” Control Circuit Range / Performance
P0969: Pressure Control Solenoid “C” Control Circuit Range / Performance

entry.ptxt: Difference between target current of control solenoid circuit and monitor current of control solenoid circuit is more than specified.

item.ptxt: Malfunction of pressure control solenoid valve or its circuit

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0962 / P0966 / P0970: Pressure Control Solenoid “A” Control Circuit Low / Pressure Control Solenoid “B” Control Circuit Low / Pressure Control Solenoid “C” Control Circuit Low:5 A/T .

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch OFF.
Clear DTCs in TCM and ECM memories by using scan tool.
Start engine and warm it up to normal operating temperature.
Keep engine running at idle speed for 30 seconds or more.
Check DTC, pending DTC and freeze-frame data.

action.ptxt: Go to A/T System Check:5 A/T .

testgroup.title: Check for pressure control solenoid valve circuit

test1.ptxt: Disconnect solenoid connector and TCM connectors.
Check TCM and TCM connector(s) for proper connection at related terminal.
If OK, check resistance for pressure control solenoid valve circuit.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

item.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve-A: Repair “YEL/RED” and/or “BRN/RED” circuit.
Pressure control solenoid valve-B: Repair “LT GRN/BLK” and/or “LT GRN/RED” circuit.
Pressure control solenoid valve-C: Repair “LT GRN” and/or “BRN/BLU” circuit.

testgroup.title: Check pressure control solenoid valve resistance

test1.ptxt: Check solenoid connector for proper connection at related terminals.

Check resistance of pressure control solenoid valve circuit referring to Solenoid Valves (Shift Solenoid-A, Shift Solenoid-B, Shift Solenoid-E, TCC Pressure Control Solenoid, Pressure Control Solenoid-A, Pressure Control Solenoid-B and Pressure Control Solenoid-C) Inspection:5 A/T .

testgroup.question: Is check results satisfactory?

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble or faulty TCM. Check for intermittent trouble referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection . If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Replace pressure control solenoid valve or solenoid connector.
